text: hananim-i adeul-eul dusyeossda mal haneun geudeul-ui mal-eul jiwojusoseo cheon jiui modeun geos-i geubun-ui geos-eulo pung-yohanani geubun-eun adeul-i pil-yochi aniham-ila neohuineun ie daehan jeung geoleul gajigo issneunyo neohuineun neohui ga alji moshaneun geos-eulo hananim-e daehayeo malhalyeo haneunyo
